𓁸 𓎛 hair / herb / shear / 采 cǎi / chop

𓁸 ≈ 采 cǎiᵏ in 𓍲 𓈖 𓏮 𓁸 𓏥 | hair | ašenkuk

𓁸𓎛 θρίξ th'ríx 3 > 𒋠 šār شعر šaʿr שיער 𐎌𐎓𐎗𐎚 shair > hair 𓎛 helix ἕλιξ her@Armenian
𓁸 tress 3 𓈖𓃀𓂧𓏏𓁸 ein(ge)bindet bangs 𓃇 pony band

𓁸 𓏥||hair, grass|hair < shair שַׂעֲרָה 𒋠 šārtu ሣር śar = grass ɣareen 🟢 šar 𒊬 𓆰 +++

𔓇 ta ⇔ 𒋰𒉺𒀀𒉌𒅖 /tappānis/ hair toupee @ top 𓁶
𔓇 ta/ta₅/za <?> θρίξ 𓁸 ⇔
𔐬 ta turn tornado?
𔐬 za/ƫa •Zopf •Tolle (pig)tail

𓆄 𓅱 𓏏 𓁸 > feather v.t.hair

𓍲 𓈖 𓏮 𓁸 𓏥 kundíi “hair” @Vai/Niger

𓍲 𓈖 𓏮 𓁸 𓏥 sinew, suma @ Hausa (hair) < 𓍲 tṛ́.on
𓍲 𓈖 𓏌 𓏲 𓁸 Schnur𓏲Haar თმა tma tüý.ma SchnittHaar 𐍃𐌺𐌿𐍆𐍄 Schniƒt ⇔ schnipps vs Schopf™ chop !!

𓎔𓎕𓁸 flog flagella flegel φραγέλλιον pro.Seil 𓎛 Shair

𓂧 𓃀 𓈖 𓏏 𓁸 ᵏhair band

𓈙 sh + 𐎍 cer

1) SchnurrHaar = whisker
2) Schnur Haar = string cord
3) Schnur := Haar ( 𓁸 = 𓈙 sch + 三 sān + 𓏌 urn )

𐍄𐌰𐌲𐌻 tagl tail Tolle толгой 털 hair 𓄛𓄜 ⇔ Fell,Pelt,feather
𓍲𓈖𓏌𓏲𓁸 тулгӏе tu͡ʊlɣē turn, tolle (wave) თმა tma تُو tǖ.ma tüý.ma түү

𓍶 SchnUr ⇔ count 𓍿 𓈖 𓏌 𓅱 𓏏 𓏛 𓏥 ?
𓍶 SchnUr 𓍵 𓏌 𓅱 𓍢 circumference ⇔ Schenkel ?
𓍷 Schnur 𓍲 𓈖 𓏌 𓏲 𓍷 𓊌
schnorren 𓍲 𓈖 𓏌 𓅱 𓀁
=> scheren shear شعر schær

D3 𓁸 ḫaput-Haar ḫar: شعرschær kebsyt [destroy] 𓁸 F33 𓄢

𒋠 (šārtu) [SÍK] hair < Scher @ Schaf de

From Proto-Semitic *śaʿr- “hair”. Compare Ugaritic 𐎌𐎓𐎗𐎚 (šʿrt, “wool”, Classical Syriac ܣܥܪܐ (saʿrā), Arabic شَعْر (šaʿr).

𒋠 SÍK ⇔ silk/Zeug @Ziege?

𓂧 𓃀 𓈖 𓏏 𓁸 lock of hair

ܣܥܪܬܐ səʿārtā שְׂעוֹרָה śəʿōrā ش ع ر š-ʿ-r šhair 𓎛 𓁸
𓍲 𓈖 𓏮 𓁸 𓏥 | hair | suma @ Hausa timo@cush ⇔ 𓇗 hair, grass
𒊭𒋥𒍮𒊑 ša-rat zum-ri Scherer (scratch:scar=cut)
𒊭𒋥 𒍮 𒊑 barber, hairdresser
